readmoreblogcontentone.title: Reasons Extracurricular Activities should be Embraced for Children
readmoreblogcontentone.description: Children have a general content and a choice out of three specialized contents (Languages, Art & Technology) to focus on for two batches of three weeks each - all in a fun environment.
